pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Inference for Qualitative Outcomes // Implements the framework introduced in Di Francesco and Mellace (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2502.11691, shifting the focus to well- defined and interpretable estimands that quantify how treatment affects the probability distribution over outcome categories. It supports selection-on-observables, instrumental variables, regression discontinuity, and difference-in-differences designs.
